channel.title: Comments on: WiFi on the train
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: riptari filter

item.description:
<strong>multiplicity, the DR, DDN</strong>
I noticed several good links over at Tomas Krag's multiplicity blog today, you should take a peek: WiFi on Scandinavian
